org.stanwood.podcaster
Class CaptureStream

java.lang.Object
  org.stanwood.podcaster.launcher.AbstractLauncher
      org.stanwood.podcaster.CaptureStream

public class CaptureStream
extends AbstractLauncher

This class provides a entry point for capturing audio and storing meta data about. See the CaptureStream.main(String[]) method for more details.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method used to capture a stream to a audio file. The following command line syntax is passed to this method: 
 
 stream-capture [-a <url>] [-c <copyright>] [-e <description>] [-f
 <format>] [-h] [-i <title>] [-l <arg>] -o <wavFile> [-r <artist>] -t
 <msecs> -u <url>
 -a,--metaArtworkUrl <url>            Set the artwork to the URL
 -c,--metaCopyright <copyright>       Set the copyright meta data
 -e,--metaDescription <description>   Set the description meta data
 -f,--format <format>                 Capture format (wav,mp3,mp4)
 -h,--help                            Show the help
 -i,--metaTitle <title>               Set the title meta data
 -l,--log_config <arg>             The log config mode [<INFO>|<DEBUG>|<log4j config file>]
 -o,--output <wavFile>                Output file
 -r,--metaArtist <artist>             Set the artist meta data
 -t,--time <msecs>                    Capture time (msecs)
 -u,--url <url>                       Radio url

run

This does the actual work of the tool.

Specified by:
run in class AbstractLauncher
Returns:
true if successful, otherwise false.
